name: The Hall
description: You've teleported into the rear of yet another demonic stonghold. Intelligence reports there is a large hall within where many comrads have vanished. The final phrase of your orders bothered you. It said simply "Lots-a-luck!" Yes... this is a large WAD but it saves fine. Just don't add any more "things" to it. (or sectors) Well... you can if you want but it won't save then.<g> I really hope you enjoy it! (Comments welcome)
